name: vscode-angulartools
description: AngularTools is a collection of tools for exploring an Angular project, help you with documenting, reverse engineering a project or help when refactoring.

commands.title: AngularTools: Show the project directory structure
AngularTools: Generate a Markdown file of all modules in the current project.
AngularTools: Generate a Markdown file from package.json files in the workspace.
AngularTools: Generate a Directed Graph file (dgml) showing the components in the current project.
AngularTools: Show a graph representing the component hierarchy.
AngularTools: Generate a directed graph in Mermaid Markdown format.

angularTools.excludeDirectories.description: Semicolon separated list of directories that should be excluded when scanning for for Angular components.

angularTools.componentHierarchyDgml.defa.description: The default filename used when saving a component hierarchy to a Directed Graph Markup Language (Dgml) file.

angularTools.componentHierarchyDgml.grap.description: This is the algorithm used to layout the nodes of the graph. Sugiyama wil try to avoid crossing edges as far as possible. ForceDirected will try to cluster the nodes.
This will make the layout algorithm position the graph nodes in the specified direction.

angularTools.componentHierarchyDgml.root.description: The color of the root nodes of the directed graph. The string should be in rgba format.

angularTools.packageJsonMarkdownFilename.description: The default filename used when saving the packages.json as a markdown file.

angularTools.projectDirectoryStructureMa.description: The default filename used when saving the project directory structure as a markdown file.

angularTools.showComponentHierarchy.root.description: The color of the root nodes of the component hierarchy graph. The string should be in rgba format or standard css color names.

angularTools.showComponentHierarchy.edge.description: The default ending of the edges.

angularTools.showComponentHierarchy.node.description: The shape of the nodes in the component hierarchy graph. Notice that 'ellipse','circle','database','box' and 'text' have the label inside the shape, the rest have the label outside the shape.

angularTools.showComponentHierarchy.grap.description: The color of the guidelines used when selecting part of a component hierarchy graph. The string should be in rgba format or standard css color names.
The width of the guide lines shown when selecting part of a component hierarchy graph
The color of the selection rectangle used when selecting part of a component hierarchy graph. The string should be in rgba format or standard css color names.
The width of the selection rectangle shown when selecting part of a component hierarchy graph

angularTools.showComponentHierarchy.comp.description: The default name used when saving the component hierarchy to a Png file.

angularTools.componentHierarchyMarkdownF.description: The default name used when saving the component hierarchy to a markdown file.

angularTools.modulesToMarkdownFilename.description: The default name used when saving the project module to a markdown file.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
